name: openSUSE Tumbleweed
install_guide_markdown: Use the live ISO, start the installer, choose Btrfs with snapshots enabled, and keep automatic snapshots for rollbacks.

install_steps.title: Download live ISO
install_steps.detail_md: Grab the latest rolling ISO (GNOME or KDE) from download.opensuse.org.

install_steps.title: Verify checksum
install_steps.detail_md: Check SHA256 before flashing to avoid corrupted media.

install_steps.title: Run YaST installer
install_steps.detail_md: Pick Btrfs with snapshots and enable automatic rollback support.

install_steps.title: Update and snapshot
install_steps.detail_md: After install, run `sudo zypper refresh && sudo zypper dup` then create a manual snapshot.

commands.command: sudo zypper refresh && sudo zypper dup

privacy_notes: No telemetry by default; Btrfs snapshots via snapper are local only.
notes: Excellent for KDE with rollback support using snapper + Btrfs.
